Sonic::ManagedStorage::Volume::Progress

Sonic::ManagedStorage::Volume::Progress Struct Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Struct specifying additional progress info structure (beyond percent complete).

Public Attributes

  • System::UInt32 ValidBytes
    size, in bytes, that follow that are valid so this structure can be expanded to return additional information in the future
  • System::UInt32 CurrentSector
    How many sectors have been written (not the actual current sector number).
  • System::UInt32 TotalSectors
    How many total sectors to be writtten.
  • System::UInt32 ProgressType
    Type of progress being reported.
  • System::UInt32 ProgressStatus
    Job status (see Device::JobStatus).
  • System::UInt32 DeviceHandle
    Device handle, zero if none or N/A.
